data.text: Mede aseda bɛma Awurade bere nyinaa;
Me kra bɛhoahoa ne ho wɔ Awurade mu;
Mo ne me nkamfo Awurade;
Mefrɛɛ Awurade na ogyee me so;
Wɔn a wɔhwɛ nʼanim no hyerɛn
Ohiani yi frɛe, na Awurade tiee no;
Awurade bɔfo wɛn wɔn a wosuro no,
Monka nhwɛ na munhu sɛ Awurade ye.
Munsuro Awurade, mo a moyɛ nʼahotefo,
Gyata yɛ mmerɛw na ɔkɔm de wɔn,
Mommra, me mma, monyɛ aso mma me;
Mo mu hena na ɔpɛ nkwa
Ɛne ɛnsɛ sɛ ɔka kasa bɔne, na ɛsɛ sɛ ogyae atorotwa.
Twe wo ho fi bɔne ho, na yɛ papa;
Awurade ani wɔ atreneefo so
Awurade ani sa wɔn a wɔyɛ bɔne,
Atreneefo teɛ mu su, na Awurade tie wɔn;
Awurade bɛn wɔn a wɔn koma abotow
Onipa trenee behu amane bebree
ɔbɔ ne nnompe nyinaa ho ban,
Bɔne bekum ɔdebɔneyɛni;
Awurade gye nʼasomfo nkwa;
